channel.title: Release Notes on Starcoin
channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes on Starcoin

item.title: v0.3.1
item.description: Epoch and Uncle Block mechanism are introduced.

item.title: v0.4.1
item.description: Refactor and stabilize the basic data types and Stdlib.

item.title: v0.4.2
item.description: Account and State command enhancement.

item.title: v0.4.3
item.description: Sync bug fix.

item.title: v0.4.4
item.description: Stdlib adds Spec validation logic for 80% coverage.

item.title: v0.4.5
item.description: Refactor uncle block and open block, create_block_template and implement service registry.

item.title: v0.4.6
item.description: Support user-defined custom chain, Support multiple Stdlib versions, implements a token gov module for voting governance mechanism

item.title: v0.5.0
item.description: Service refactor

item.title: v0.5.1
item.description: Refactor consensus config, add pre_mine and time locked genesis init

item.title: v0.7.0
item.description: Refactor consensus, implements of new algorithms of cryptonight, optimize accumulator, each epoch dynamically adjusts block gas limit

item.title: v0.7.1
item.description: Fix bug and cleanup.

item.title: v0.8.0
item.description: Sync optimize and stdlib refactor.

item.title: v0.9.0
item.description: Stdlib v7 and p2p network optimize

item.title: v0.9.1
item.description: Refactor miner & BlockTemplate & OpenedBlock and sync node data to elasticsearch

item.title: v0.9.2
item.description: Optimizing network and synchronization

item.title: v0.9.3
item.description: Fix the bug that miner_client cannot continue mining after network failure

item.title: v0.9.4
item.description: Add peer scoring mechanism

item.title: v0.10.0
item.description: StateDB and AccessPath refactor

item.title: v0.10.1
item.description: Refactor BlockHeader and module compatibility check, optimize tx propagation

item.title: v1.0.0-alpha
item.description: Implement list-resource api and optimize rpc, system reinforcement

item.title: v1.0.0-alpha.1
item.description: Upgrade move-vm to latest for support new Move language features

item.title: v1.0.0-beta
item.description: Upgrade MoveVm and refactor Stdlib. To support the new abilities syntax, and ScriptFunction as defined in Module. Prepare to officially launch the new Barnard network.

item.title: v1.0.0-beta.1
item.description: Generate and include barnard genesis.

item.title: v1.0.0-beta.2
item.description: Optimize sync and network broadcast message handle.

item.title: v1.0.0-beta.3
v1.0.0-beta.4
item.description: Network protocol updates to prepare for new protocols or support for light nodes in the future.

item.title: v1.0.0-beta.5
item.description:
Network protocol upgrade, optimize transaction broadcast protocol; Support stratum mining pool protocol; Move contract upgrade method optimization: support incompatible upgrade through governance, and implement hard fork through on-chain governance (sip-4).

Note: starcoin nodes should upgrade to the latest version as soon as possible, a hard fork test will be conducted soon, which will cause nodes with older versions to be unable to execute the latest blocks.

item.title: v1.0.0-beta.6
item.description: Improve stdlib upgrade

item.title: v1.0.0-rc
item.description: Introduce Treasury and prepare for main network launch.

item.title: v1.0.0
item.description: Generate the Genesis block and the main network is launched.

item.title: v1.1.0
item.description: Account and Miner rpc and command enhancements

item.title: v1.2.0
item.description:
Released the Move CLI tool and refactored the authentication key verification mechanism.

Note: This release contains hard fork features that will be activated after stdlib is upgraded to v5 version. Please upgrade to the latest version and wait for the upgrade proposal to be initiated before conducting an on-chain vote. Detailed instructions on voting will be given after the upgrade proposal is submitted.

item.title: v1.3.0
item.description:
Move version upgrade, command line development tool improvement, miner client support stratum mining pool protocol, stdlib v5 follow-up update

Compatibility notes:

  1. cleaned up and refactored some cli commands, some commands are not compatible
  2. The account address literals in the new Move source code need to be prefixed with @ symbols, for example, 0xA550C18 needs to be changed to @0xA550C18.

Upgrade recommendation:

Please upgrade to the new version to be ready for open third-party Move contract deployment

item.title: v1.4.0
item.description:
Introduce StructABI,ModuleABI,ScriptFunctionABI for auto decode resource,transaction payload and move bytecode.

  • Add new API: contract.dry_run_raw,contract.resolve_function, contract.resolve_struct, contract.resolve_module, state.get_resource,state.list_resource,state.get_code,state.list_code.
  • Add new command: dev resolve function|struct|module, state get|list resource|code

Compatibility notes:

  1. Refactored some cli commands, some commands output are not compatible
  2. contract.dry_run API output is not compatible.
  3. Deprecated BlockHeader’s author_auth_key field, author_auth_key is always None from this version. This is compatible.

Upgrade suggestion:

Bug (#2689) may cause wrong transaction info to be retrieved, please upgrade to v1.3.1 or v1.4.0 as soon as possible

item.title: v1.5.0
item.description: This release contains the following important features. Move stdlib upgrades to V6. Fix a bug in VM which can cause some resources cannot be written into chain state when upgrading modules.This’s a BREAKING change. #161 starcion-cli supports two node managing commands: delete a specific block and reset node startup info. #2792, #2796 Some internal improvements, like #2794, and bugfix #2787. Full release note can be found here. Upgrade suggestion: This version is not compatible with old versions.
